adDetails: Hello Craigslist! Are you wanting to redecorate your home and want to do it for a low price? Then you have found the right person for the job! Whether its TILE,MARMOLE,CARPET,VYNIL,LAMINATE, HARDWOOD FLOORS,VCT,OR COMMERCIAL CARPET. My prices are cheaper than any company out there GUARANTEED! Let me know what kind of flooring you need and I will find it for you. I can work with your budget no problem. I am also available to do repairs so if you need any kind of floor repair I can do that also. FREE ESTIMATES! Feel free call/text at show contact info ask for Edward.
